word_mean: 血清的：有关或类似血清的
浆液的：产生或包含浆液的，如浆液腺或浆液囊肿

sentence.Network_en: Adhesions involving the aforementioned serous surfaces are not uncommon.
sentence.Network_cn: 上述浆膜表面的粘连亦非少见.

sentence.Network_en: Seromucous glands contain both mucous and serous cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 浆粘液腺既含有粘液性细胞,又含有浆液性细胞.

sentence.Network_en: Even a common cold can cause serous complications to a patient.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为甚至是一般的感冒也有可能给病人引起致命的并发症.

list.abs: ...纤维素性炎,化脓性炎,出血性炎等类型,1,浆液性炎浆液性炎,serous inflammation,是以浆液渗出为主的炎症,渗出物中主要为含多量白蛋白的血清,其中混有少量细胞和纤维素.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French séreux or medieval Latin serosus, from serum (see serum)

means.word_mean: 1. of or producing or containing serum;
